about_the_game: This scenery package adds more high resolution aerial images to your Aerofly FS 4 Flight Simulator for the United States of America regions to further enhance the ground image resolution in areas further away from any airports. Currently Aerofly FS 4 offers airports at the east and west coast of the USA. This DLC is ideal for VFR back-country flying if you have a bit of free disk space and a decent internet connection. The images are stored offline, no constant internet connection is required.
